extendedInfo.description: All your cottages in one click!Every Cottage provides access to all the cottage advertisements from the internet in one simple search.Searching for self catering properties couldnât be easier and faster with Every Cottage's simple and easy interfaceUse Every Cottage to:- Search cottage ads by key words, location- View the cottage description without leaving the applicationThe Every Cottage application is free and there is no need to register to use it.This mobile version of Every Cottage's search engine is available to you -anywhere and anytime. Don't let that perfect cottage escape from you this time!
